about_the_game:
Sakura Miko and 35P are ready for battle!
Miko Sniper is a chaotic shooting game where you get to shoot, burn and explode your enemies!

Let's go 35P！

Slashing, Striking, Flame throwers and powering up your stats!
Fight together defeat incoming enemies with 35P who have various unique abilities!

Feeling going on a date？

Changing your clothes will also change your play style!
Enhance 35P's abilities to clear stages easier.
Increase the number of enemies to achieve high scores.
There are many ways to enjoy this game!


This game is published under CCMC Corp(※1)'s Indie game brand "holo Indie".(※2)
This game is allowed to be monetized under the examination and terms of "holo Indie".
Please note that any monetized derivative work games that include Cover Corp.'s content outside of holo Indie is not covered by these terms and is not allowed.

※1. About CCMC Corp.
CCMC Corp. is entrusted with website management (ex: steam) including, examination, publishing and other necessary tasks by Cover Corp.

※2. About "holo Indie"
holo Indie's objective is to cooperate with hololive production fans and creators.
It is a game brand that offers "Game Creator Support Program" for the derivative work games.
For more details about "holo Indie", Please refer to the Cover Corp.'s "Derivative work guidelines".

name: Miko Sniper

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Any 64 bit CPU
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

short_description: Sakura Miko and 35P are ready for battle! Miko Sniper is a chaotic shooting game where you get to shoot, burn and explode your enemies!
supported_languages: English, Japanese, Indonesian, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
